dialogue.htmlContent:
A short way down the western road which connects Elis to the far-off Shinrin Highlands, a large, natural clearing in the woods has been expanded, reshaped, and levelled into a huge, flat rectangle. Surrounding this space, a perimeter ditch has been dug, and as an extra layer of protection, the trees which were chopped down to expand the clearing have been used to construct a chest-high wall. The creators of this fortification, and the people who are now occupying the hundreds of tents that have been set up inside it, are the Amazon refugees from Themiscyra.

Posted at each of the entrances to this fortified camp, a pair of Amazon warriors are standing guard. As you approach, they cross their dories to signal that your entry is forbidden. Clearly having mistaken you for a stranger, these sentinels will surely lower their guard and grant you entry to their camp if you were to tell them who you are...

Wanting to head into the Amazons' camp and take a look around, you approach the two warriors who are standing guard at its entrance. Keeping their dories crossed to bar your passage, the guards glare at you in a menacing fashion as the more senior of the two declares, [style.speechFeminineStrong(Halt! You're no Amazon; you can't come in here!)]

Fortunately, at that moment you spot the familiar figure of Aurokaris walking through the camp a short distance up ahead. Thinking that it's going to help to have this Amazon vouch for you, you call out to the cow-girl and manage to get her attention. Walking over to the guards, she gestures towards you and declares, #IF(pc.hasPerkAnywhereInTree(PERK_HERO_OF_THEMISCYRA)) [aurokaris.speech(This is the Hero#IF(pc.isFeminine())ine#ENDIF who defeated dozens of Lunette's daughters Themiscyra, before helping to saving our queen! [pc.She] may not be one of us, but [pc.sheHas] earned the right to enter our camp!)] #ELSE [aurokaris.speech(This is the [pc.race] who helped to save our queen in Themiscyra! [pc.She] may not be one of us, but [pc.sheHas] earned the right to enter our camp!)] #ENDIF

Clearly knowing Aurokaris and respecting her authority, the sentries uncross their dories, before the leader states, [style.speechFeminineStrong(Very well, you may enter. We'll make sure that the other guards are informed of who you are, so you shouldn't have any trouble entering our camp again.)]

As you [pc.step] forwards to greet Aurokaris, the other guard menacingly warns, #IF(!pc.isFeminine()) [style.speechFeminine(We'll be keeping an eye on you. Considering how masculine you are, you're very fortunate to be allowed into our camp. Behave yourself, or else you'll have us to answer to...)] #ELSE [style.speechFeminine(We'll be keeping an eye on you. Behave yourself, or else you'll have us to answer to...)] #ENDIF

[aurokaris.speech([pc.She] won't cause any trouble,)] Aurokaris reassures the guard, before motioning you to follow her and happily saying, [aurokaris.speech(Come on, [pc.name], I'll show you around.)]

[pc.Walking] forwards and entering the Amazons' camp, you follow Aurokaris as she leads you down a relatively wide pathway which is flanked by dozens of tents of all colours, shapes, and sizes. While some are smaller than others, all are of a considerable size, with even the very smallest that you see looking like it'd be able to comfortably house two or three people. Gesturing around her, the cow-girl reveals, [aurokaris.speech(We managed to bring quite a few tents with us as we evacuated Themiscyra, but a lot of these were made after we arrived at Elis. I think we must have bought every last scrap of cloth in the town...)]

Seeing more than one forlorn look on the faces of the many Amazons who you pass, you ask Aurokaris how they're managing after losing their hometown to Lunexis's army. Putting on a brave face, the muscular cow-girl cheerily replies, [aurokaris.speech(We'll be fine, don't you worry about us! We've got all the essentials here, and it's only a matter of time before we take our town back. Speaking of essentials, look, here's where we've set up our marketplace.)]

Having reached a T-junction at the end of the path you've been travelling on, you look left to where Aurokaris is gesturing. The Amazons' marketplace appears to consist of about a dozen tents, each one of which is much larger than those being used as accommodation, and within each one you see that food, drink, clothing, and other miscellaneous goods have been stacked upon wooden tables and shelves. Pointing to the one that's closest to where you're currently standing, Aurokaris reveals, [aurokaris.speech(I work in that tent during the day, so you can come and visit me from eight in the morning to six at night if you ever want to buy anything. I wouldn't try to trade with anyone else if I were you; most Amazons are distrustful of strangers, and after what happened back at Themiscyra tensions are running pretty high...)]

Thanking your companion for the warning, you move to continue following her as she turns away from the marketplace and declares, [aurokaris.speech(Come on, I'll take you past Ursa's tent and show you the sparring field.)]

Continuing to follow Aurokaris, you set off down another pathway, and are soon lead past Ursa's tent. As is to be expected of the tent which houses the queen of the Amazons, it's far bigger than any other you've seen so far, and actually looks to consist of several large tents which have been joined together. Motioning towards the two bear-girl guards at the tent's entrance, Aurokaris states, [aurokaris.speech(If you want to see Ursa, just tell the guards who you are. Our queen is very busy at all times of the day and night, but I'm sure that she'll make time to see you after what you did for her back in Themiscyra.)]

Continuing past the queen's tent, Aurokaris leads you to the edge of a large, sandy square. Scattered throughout this open space, pairs of Amazons are wrestling and sparring with one another, while on the far side an archery range has been set up for warriors who want to practice with a bow. Turning to face you, your cow-girl guide explains, [aurokaris.speech(All Amazons are required to practice their combat skills at least three times a week. Now more than ever we need to keep our skills sharp, as one day soon we'll be marching off to retake Themiscyra. While it should be fine for you to watch, you'd better not try to get involved; things could easily get out of hand and then you'd have a real fight on your hands.)]

Turning to point out a relatively small, pale blue tent that's tucked into a corner on the far side of the sparring field, she reveals, [aurokaris.speech(That's my tent over there if you need me in an emergency. I'd rather you didn't disturb me while I'm in there, though, as I always need a good night's rest. Anyway, that's pretty much all of the interesting parts of our camp. #IF(game.isHourBetween(8, 18)) I need to go and get back to work at the marketplace now. Remember, I work there between eight in the morning to six in the evening, so if you want me then come and find me there. #ELSE Speaking of a good night's rest, I really should be getting to bed now. Remember, I work at the marketplace between eight in the morning to six in the evening, so if you want me then come and find me there. #ENDIF Bye, [pc.name], oh and thanks again for all of your help back in Themiscyra!)]
After you've said goodbye to her, Aurokaris gives you once last wave and runs off, leaving you to explore the Amazon camp in your own time...

You find yourself standing at the main entrance to the Amazons' camp. A pair of warriors, equipped with dories, are standing guard on either side of the path.

[style.feminineSpeech(You'd better be on your best behaviour in there,)] one of these guards warns you, before the two of them flash you suspicious looks.

Having saved their queen from Themiscyra, and with Aurokaris having vouched for your good character, you have nothing to fear from these Amazons, no matter how many hostile glares they throw your way. Still, you decide that it would be best not to do anything that would give them an excuse to harass you, and so you turn away from them and wonder where to go to form here...
Having concluded your business in here, you pass the sentinels and head back out into the cleared area of woodland which surrounds the Amazons' camp...

Compacted gravel forms the relatively wide pathway which serves as the main route through the Amazons' camp. Travelling down this road, you end up passing dozens of tents of all colours, shapes, and sizes. Here and there, wooden crates are stacked up in between these tents, and you assume that they contain whatever belongings were able to be taken with the Amazons during their retreat from Themiscyra.

As you pass the feminine warriors who call this temporary accommodation home, you can't help but notice that they're giving you suspicious glances, with some even going so far as to glare at you in a hostile manner. Not wanting to do anything that would justify these Amazons' distrust of strangers, you ignore their menacing looks and continue on your way down the path...

As you pass them by, you see that no two of the tents which have been erected within the Amazons' camp are alike. Varying not only in size and shape, these canvas dwellings are found in a dazzling array of colours, from sky blue to dark red and everything in-between. While some are smaller than others, all are of a considerable size, with even the very smallest that you see looking like it'd be able to comfortably house two or three people.

The Amazons who are found here don't seem to appreciate your proximity to their homes, and glare at you in a hostile manner as you pass. Although your presence seems to be grudgingly tolerated, you decide that it's probably best not to linger here for too long, and so swiftly continue on your way...

Serving both as a meeting place and the area in which the Amazons' combat skills are practised, the large, sandy square before you is currently in use by at least two dozen female warriors. Wrestling, crossing dories, or competing with bows to hit distant archery targets, these Amazons are so focused on their sparring that they either don't notice you or decide not to pay you any attention.

At regular intervals around the square, you see that weapon racks are stocked with spare dories and bows. Deciding that it would be a very bad idea to try and take one of these weapons, and soon having had enough of watching the Amazons spar with one another, you decide to continue on your way through the camp...

Looking around, you see that the Amazons' marketplace consists of about a dozen tents, each one of which is much larger than those being used as accommodation. #IF(game.isHourBetween(8, 18)) Within each one you see that food, drink, clothing, and other miscellaneous goods have been stacked upon wooden tables and shelves. A nearby sign reminds shoppers that the tents are only open between [style.colourMinorGood([units.time(8)]-[units.time(18)])], and so as you can see from the fact that there are many Amazons passing to and fro between each stall, the marketplace is currently [style.colourGood(open)]. #ELSE A nearby sign reminds shoppers that the tents are only open between [style.colourMinorBad([units.time(8)]-[units.time(18)])], and so as you can see from the fact that this area is currently deserted, the marketplace is currently [style.colourBad(closed)]. #ENDIF

#IF(game.getCharactersPresent().contains(aurokaris)) Although the goods on offer in all of the tents look interesting, you remember Aurokaris's warning about Amazons being distrustful of strangers and so not to bother them. Looking over to the cow-girl's stall, you see her standing behind a table with a bored expression on her face. If you wanted to buy something, you could head over to her stall and see what she's got for sale... #ELSE As all of the tents are tied up and closed for the day, you'll have to leave and return during opening hours if you wanted to buy something... #ENDIF

#IF(aurokaris.isVisiblyPregnant())

Deciding that you'd like to pay Aurokaris another visit while she's at work, you head over to her stall. As usual, although most of the other tents are busy with customers, the cow-girl's community store doesn't seem to be attracting any shoppers at all, thanks to the high prices of all the goods on offer.

[aurokaris.speech(Oh, hi, [pc.name]!)] the cow-girl calls out as she sees you approaching. Standing upright, she gestures down to her stomach, and you see that #IF(!aurokaris.isCharacterReactedToPregnancy(pc)) she's sporting a [style.colourSex(pregnant belly)]. Blushing as she smiles at you, she reveals, [aurokaris.speech(I haven't been with anyone else, so it was you who got me pregnant... Oh, don't worry about having to do anything to help; I can manage it just fine!)] #ELSE she's still sporting a [style.colourSex(pregnant belly)]. Blushing as she smiles at you, she reveals, [aurokaris.speech(I've been coping with it just fine! There's really no need for any help with anything!)] #ENDIF

Gesturing you forwards, the cow-girl takes hold of your [pc.hand] and guides it down to her belly, letting out a soft gasp as she gets you to feel her pregnant bump. As you run your [pc.fingers+] over her distended belly, the cow-girl gently sighs and says, [aurokaris.speech(I think it would be best to avoid sparring while I'm like this. After I've given birth we can do it again if you'd like... Anyway, did you want to buy anything? Sorry about the high prices; there's nothing I can do about them.)]

#ELSE

Deciding that you'd like to pay Aurokaris a visit while she's at work, you head over to her stall. Although most of the other tents are busy with customers, the cow-girl doesn't seem to be attracting any shoppers at all. The reason for this is soon made clear, for as you approach, you see that the prices on display appear to be quite steep.

[aurokaris.speech(Oh, hi, [pc.name]!)] the cow-girl calls out as she sees you approaching. Noticing that you're taking a look at the goods which are on offer, she explains, [aurokaris.speech(This is a community store, so I don't get to set the prices. I'm just the one who's got stuck running this place...)]

#IF(!flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_amazon_camp_aurokaris_sparred)) Letting out a sigh to indicate how bored she is, the cow-girl complains, [aurokaris.speech(I can't even do anything productive during my break. All of my regular sparring partners have ended up being assigned similar community services, and trying to coordinate times to go and have a sparring session has turned out to be impossible... Anyway, did you want to buy anything? Sorry about the high prices; there's nothing I can do about them.)] #ELSE Changing her tone, the cow-girl flashes you a big smile and happily says, [aurokaris.speech(Thanks for the sparring session earlier, by the way. I hope that you'll come back and do it again with me another day... Anyway, did you want to buy anything? Sorry about the high prices; there's nothing I can do about them.)] #ENDIF

#ENDIF #IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_amazon_camp_aurokaris_tent_visited))

Before you can answer, the muscular Amazon lets out a little moan, and as she starts to blush, she says, #IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_amazon_camp_aurokaris_tent_had_sex)) [aurokaris.speech(I had a lot of fun with you last night... Perhaps we could have some fun again this evening? You know where my tent is if you want to do it again...)] #ELSE [aurokaris.speech(Thanks for visiting me last night, but... Well, perhaps we could actually do something together tonight? You know where my tent is if you want to try it...)] #ENDIF

#ELSEIF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_amazon_camp_aurokaris_tent_had_sex))

Before you can answer, the muscular Amazon lets out a little moan, and as she starts to blush, she asks, [aurokaris.speech(Are we going to have some fun tonight? You know where my tent is...)]

#IF(aurokaris.isAttractedTo(pc) && !flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_amazon_camp_aurokaris_ambrosia_tasting) && pc.isAbleToAccessCoverableArea(CA_MOUTH, true))

Returning the Amazon's smile, you tell her that you'll stop by again if you have the time. Clearly not wanting to wait until then to get some action, she leans forwards over the counter and playfully suggests, [aurokaris.speech(I've got something naughty in mind... How about you join me for some ambrosia tasting? I've got some samples from the latest batch which haven't been enchanted yet, so you can drink it without having any of the usual effects.)]

Telling Aurokaris that this doesn't exactly sound very 'naughty', you make the cow-girl blush and awkwardly reveal, [aurokaris.speech(Well, I was thinking that... I mean... I was going to let you lick it off of me... So if you've got time, and if you want to, come into the tent and we can have some fun...)]

#ENDIF #ELSEIF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_amazon_camp_aurokaris_tent_invite_received))

Before you can answer, the muscular Amazon lets out a little moan, and as she starts to blush, she awkwardly reminds you, [aurokaris.speech(You know, I was serious about you visiting my tent at night... I mean, if you wanted to, we could have some fun in there... I really kind of like you...)]

#ENDIF

Having concluded your business with Aurokaris, you tell her that that you need to leave now. Saying goodbye, the cow-girl waves to you as you [pc.step] away from her tent and head off into the camp, wondering what to do next...

As you take a look at what Aurokaris has for sale, she states, [aurokaris.speech(The sort of food and drink I've got here varies from day to day, as it's just whatever can be bought from Elis for a good price that morning. The potions, clothing, and weapons that we Amazons make should always be available, though.)]

Picking up on what Aurokaris said, you ask her if she'd like you to act as her sparring partner today. Clapping her hands together in joy, she enthusiastically replies, [aurokaris.speech(Really? You'd do that for me? Thanks, [pc.name]!)]

Not giving you a chance to change your mind, the cow-girl quickly closes her tent and places a sign in front of it declaring that she's on her lunch break. Grabbing hold of your [pc.hand], she happily leads you through the camp to the sparring field, before gesturing to one of the nearby weapon racks and asking, [aurokaris.speech(Would you like to use a dory or a bow? Or perhaps we should leave the weapons behind and wrestle instead?)]

[style.speechFeminine(Hey, Aurokaris, you're not seriously going to let an outsider spar with you, are you?)] a nearby Amazon shouts out in a disapproving tone.

Turning to face the warrior who just spoke, Aurokaris silences her by loudly declaring for all to hear, #IF(pc.hasPerkAnywhereInTree(PERK_HERO_OF_THEMISCYRA)) [aurokaris.speech(This is the Hero#IF(pc.isFeminine())ine#ENDIF of Themiscyra! [pc.She] saved our queen, so [pc.sheHas] earned the right to be here!)] #ELSE [aurokaris.speech(This is the [pc.race] who fought alongside me in Themiscyra! [pc.She] helped to save our queen, so [pc.sheHas] earned the right to be here!)] #ENDIF

With that, the cow-girl turns back to you and once again asks, [aurokaris.speech(So, what'll it be, [pc.name]? A dory, some archery practice, or wrestling?)]

#IF(!flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_amazon_camp_aurokaris_sparred_unarmed) || !flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_amazon_camp_aurokaris_sparred_ranged) || !flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_amazon_camp_aurokaris_sparred_melee))

#IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_amazon_camp_aurokaris_sparred_unarmed)) You've previously chosen to [style.colourMinorBad(wrestle)] with Aurokaris without using a weapon, so perhaps you should try something else this time. #ELSE You haven't yet sparred with Aurokaris without using a weapon, so choosing to [style.colourMinorGood(wrestle)] with her might be a good option. #ENDIF

#IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_amazon_camp_aurokaris_sparred_melee)) You've already learned a thing or two about using a [style.colourMinorBad(dory)], so maybe you should choose something else this time. #ELSE You haven't yet tried using Aurokaris's favourite weapon, the [style.colourMinorGood(dory)], so maybe you should choose that. #ENDIF

#IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_amazon_camp_aurokaris_sparred_ranged)) Your last competition with Aurokaris using a [style.colourMinorBad(bow)] went well, but there's not much more to be learned by doing it again. #ELSE Perhaps using the [style.colourMinorGood(bow)] would be a good way to learn something new from Aurokaris. #ENDIF

#ELSE

You've already sparred with Aurokaris in every way imaginable, so there's not really anything else to be gained from this other than having fun. As such, any weapon choice would be much the same as another.

#ENDIF

Not wanting to use a weapon, you tell Aurokaris that you'd like to wrestle with her. Happily nodding at your choice, the cow-girl leads you onto the sandy ground of the sparring field, before instructing you on how to assume the correct wrestling stance and what sort of moves you'll be practising against one another. Once she's happy with your position, she makes the signal to start, and so there begins an hour of exertion in which the two of you wrestle and grapple with one another in a multitude of different ways.

Your time wrestling with the cow-girl flies by, and as the hour comes to an end, you find yourself panting for breath and #IF(pc.isAttractedTo(aurokaris)) feeling a little turned on from having spent so much time in contact with Aurokaris's muscular, sweaty body. #ELSE feeling quite worn out from having spent so much time trying to counter Aurokaris's powerful moves. #ENDIF Smiling at you, #IF(aurokaris.isAttractedTo(pc)) and blushing a little as she glances down at your body, #ENDIF the cow-girl asks, [aurokaris.speech(How did you find that, [pc.name]? You did really well!)]

Deciding that you'd like to use a melee weapon, you tell Aurokaris that sparring with dories would suit you. Happily nodding at your choice, the cow-girl grabs a couple of long spears from a nearby weapon rack, and after throwing one your way, she leads you onto the sandy ground of the sparring field. Instructing you on how to assume the correct stances and what sort of moves you'll be practising against one another, she makes sure that she's happy with your position before giving the signal to start. With that, an hour of exertion begins, in which the two of you use your weapons to thrust, strike, and lunge at one another in a multitude of different ways.

Your time sparring with the cow-girl flies by, and as the hour comes to an end, you find yourself panting for breath and #IF(pc.isAttractedTo(aurokaris)) feeling a little turned on from having spent so much time watching Aurokaris's muscular, sweaty body jump and bounce around. #ELSE feeling quite worn out from having spent so much time trying to counter Aurokaris's powerful moves. #ENDIF Smiling at you, #IF(aurokaris.isAttractedTo(pc)) and blushing a little as she glances down at your body, #ENDIF the cow-girl asks, [aurokaris.speech(How did you find that, [pc.name]? You did really well!)]

Deciding that you'd like to use a ranged weapon, you tell Aurokaris that spending some time on the archery range would suit you. Happily nodding at your choice, the cow-girl grabs a couple of compound bows from a nearby weapon rack, and after throwing one your way, she leads you onto the sandy ground of the sparring field. Instructing you on how to assume the correct stances and how your shots will be scored, she makes sure that she's happy with your position before giving the signal to start. With that, an hour of exertion begins, in which the two of you use your weapons to compete against one another to score the most bullseyes on the distant archery targets.

Your time practising archery with the cow-girl flies by, and as the hour comes to an end, you find yourself panting for breath and #IF(pc.isAttractedTo(aurokaris)) feeling a little turned on from having spent so much time in close proximity to Aurokaris's muscular, sweaty body. #ELSE feeling quite worn out from having spent so much time competing against Aurokaris. #ENDIF Smiling at you, #IF(aurokaris.isAttractedTo(pc)) and blushing a little as she glances down at your body, #ENDIF the cow-girl asks, [aurokaris.speech(How did you find that, [pc.name]? You did really well!)]

As you stretch and shake off the soreness in your muscles, you truthfully tell your Amazon sparring partner that you enjoyed your session with her. Smiling at you, she says, [aurokaris.speech(Thanks for doing this with me, [pc.name]. I was bored out of my mind back at the marketplace, but now I'm really feeling alive!)]

Before you can reply to this, a mischievous grin flashes across the cow-girl's face. Retrieving her personal dory which she'd left in the weapon rack during your sparring session, she asks, [aurokaris.speech(How about we have a full-contact duel to finish things off? We can use Amazon tournament rules, so everything's permitted with the only real rule being that you have to stop fighting when your opponent submits.)]
[style.italicsExcellent(You feel like Aurokaris has nothing more to teach you, and that you've really learned a lot from sparring with her in so many different ways!)]

Taking a few steps back, Aurokaris holds up her hands in a clear sign of submission and pants, [aurokaris.speech(No more... You win...)]

With that, the cow-girl collapses down onto the sandy ground of the sparring field, panting for breath. [pc.Walking] forwards, you offer your partner your [pc.hand], and with a happy grin on her face, Aurokaris takes it and allows you to help her back up onto her feet. Still smiling as she brushes herself off, she happily exclaims, [aurokaris.speech(It's great to finally have a worthy sparring partner again! I always beat my usual partners, but you give me a real challenge, [pc.name]!)]

Telling Aurokaris that you enjoyed your duel, you say that perhaps you'll stop by her tent another time so that you can do this again. #IF(flags.hasFlag(FLAG_innoxia_amazon_camp_aurokaris_tent_invite_received)) As she happily nods her head as you suggest this, the cow-girl suddenly starts to blush, and after fidgeting around on the spot for a moment, she nervously confesses, [aurokaris.speech(You know, [pc.name], I really do kind of like you... Remember that you're welcome to... Well... You know... You can come and see me in my tent after work...)] #ELSE As she happily nods her head as you suggest this, the cow-girl suddenly starts to blush, and after fidgeting around on the spot for a moment, she nervously confesses, [aurokaris.speech(You know, [pc.name], I really do kind of like you... I'd be happy if you would... Well... I mean... You can come and see me in my tent after work if you'd like... Perhaps we could... You know...)] #ENDIF

Despite being one of the strongest and most confident of the Amazon warriors, Aurokaris doesn't seem to know quite how to fully express her feelings. Thoroughly embarrassed at her confession, she doesn't give you time to respond, and after giving you a quick wave goodbye, she runs off in the direction of the marketplace, leaving you to think about her invitation and continue on your way...

Telling Aurokaris that you enjoyed your duel, you say that perhaps you'll stop by her tent another time so that you can do this again. Happily nodding her head as you suggest this, the cow-girl replies, [aurokaris.speech(That'd be great! I should really be getting back to work now though, so I'm going to have to dash. See you later, [pc.name]!)]

With that, the cow-girl Amazon gives you one last wave, before running off in the direction of the marketplace, leaving you to brush yourself off and continue on your way...

Taking a few steps back, you hold up your [pc.hands] in a clear sign of submission and tell Aurokaris that she's got the better of you. Unable to remain standing, you collapse down onto the sandy floor of the sparring field, panting for breath.

Walking forwards, your partner offers you her hand, and with a happy grin on her face, Aurokaris helps you back up onto your feet. Still smiling as she waits for you to brush yourself off, she happily exclaims, [aurokaris.speech(It's great to finally have a worthy sparring partner again! I always easily beat my usual partners, but you give me a real challenge, [pc.name]!)]

Saying that you don't think an all-out duel is a good idea, you tell Aurokaris that you've had enough for now.

[aurokaris.speech(Oh, ok,)] Aurokaris replies with a disappointed sigh, [aurokaris.speech(I suppose that I should really be getting back to work anyway. Thanks for sparring with me, [pc.name], and I'll see you later!)]

With that, the cow-girl Amazon gives you one last wave, before running off in the direction of the marketplace, leaving you to brush yourself off and continue on your way...

Liking the sound of what Aurokaris is suggesting, you tell her that you'd like to help her taste the newest batch of ambrosia. Playfully biting her lip, the cow-girl glances around to make sure that there are no incoming customers, and once she's satisfied that the coast is clear, she gestures you forwards and says, [aurokaris.speech(Come on, [pc.name], I'll close the tent after you.)]

[pc.Stepping] around the table which separates you from Aurokaris, you head into the rear of the large tent as the muscular Amazon ties the canvas flaps shut. Turning to face you, she blushes as she shrugs off her peplos and allows it to drop to the floor, exposing her naked body to you in the process. Skipping over to grab a nearby bottle of ambrosia, and causing her [aurokaris.cupSize]-cup breasts to bounce in a hypnotic manner in the process, the cow-girl bats her eyelashes at you and excitedly pants, [aurokaris.speech(Which part of me did you want to lick it off of?)]
